text: Hanging with Hoges is a 2014 one-hour documentary about Paul Hogan hosted by Shane Jacobson. He talks about his success with Crocodile Dundee, his family life, and his battles with the Australian Tax Office. It also shows excerpts from this live stage show.Hanging with Hoges at Shane Jacobson website Hogan agreed to make it because of his relationship with Jacobson and producer/director Dean Murphy; the three men had made Charlie and Boots together. It aired on the ABC in December 2014.Hanging with Hoges at ABC ==References== ==External links== * Category:Australian Broadcasting Corporation specials Category:2014 television films
title: Hanging with Hoges
